message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SD, cs.HC

The paper deals with the technical and data-driven responses to online romance scams, which are a form of mass-marketing fraud. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR), as the paper aims to develop a system to detect romance scammers on online dating platforms. The paper also involves the use of machine learning and data analysis techniques to identify the characteristics of online dating profiles used in this form of fraud, which falls under the categories of social and information retrieval (cs.SI), cybernetics (cs.CY), and software development (cs.SD). Additionally, the paper discusses the psychological traits of victims of romance scams, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
